messages.content: I'm looking to start working out more but my schedule is pretty packed. I used to run 10K or more about 1 year ago. I'm looking for activities using regular gym equipment, jumping rope, and gymnastic rings which will be both aerobic and anaerobic exercise. I can probably get 15-20 minutes a day of exercise during weekdays and 1 hour during weekends. Help me plan a 1 month ramping up plan and a regular plan after that achieving the 75min high intensity weekly goal, assume the week starts on sunday

Sure, I can definitely help you with that! Here's a plan that you can follow for the next 1 month to ramp up your exercise routine:
Week 1:
Day 1:
* Warm up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of bodyweight squats
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of push-ups
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of mountain climbers
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of burpees
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of jumping jacks
Day 2:
* Warm up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell chest press
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell rows
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell lateral raise
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell overhead press
Day 3:
* Rest
Day 4:
* Warm up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of jump lunges
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of bodyweight squats
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of mountain climbers
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of burpees
Day 5:
* Warm up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell chest press
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell rows
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell lateral raise
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell overhead press
Day 6:
* Rest
Day 7:
* Warm up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of squat jumps
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of bodyweight squats
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of mountain climbers
* Rest
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of burpees
Week 2:
Day 1:
* Warm
Keep the plan high-level and make sure to only include exercise equipment I have such as gym equipment, running shoes and not swimming  or rowing machines

Sure, here's a revised plan that includes only equipment you have:
Day 1:
* Warm-up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of bodyweight squats
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell chest press
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell rows
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell lateral raise
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell overhead press
Day 2:
* Warm-up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell chest press
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell rows
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell lateral raise
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell overhead press
Day 3:
* Rest
Day 4:
* Warm-up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell chest press
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell rows
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell lateral raise
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell overhead press
Day 5:
* Rest
Day 6:
* Warm-up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of jumping rope
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of bodyweight squats
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of mountain climbers
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of burpees
Day 7:
* Rest
Week 3:
Day 1:
* Warm-up with jumping rope for 5 minutes
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of bodyweight squats
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell chest press
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell rows
* Rest for 1 minute between sets
* Do 3 sets of 10 reps of dumbbell lateral raise
* Rest for 1
You're welcome! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with.
